General.Name: Balkrishna Industries Limited
General.Description: Balkrishna Industries Limited manufactures and sells tires in India, Europe, North America, and internationally. It provides off-highway tires for use in various applications, such as agricultural, construction, earthmoving, port, and mining industries. The company was incorporated in 1961 and is headquartered in Mumbai, India.
